name: select_with_join
sql: SELECT u.name, p.title FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.id = p.user_id

name: update_table
sql: UPDATE users SET name = 'John' WHERE id = 1

name: create_table
sql: CREATE TABLE products (id INT, name VARCHAR(50))

name: complex_select_with_subquery
sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM users WHERE active = true) AS active_users

name: select_with_union
sql: SELECT name FROM users UNION SELECT name FROM customers

name: with_clause
sql: WITH recent AS (SELECT * FROM orders WHERE date > '2023-01-01') SELECT * FROM recent
expected_summary: WITH recent SELECT orders SELECT recent

name: prepared_statement_style
sql: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = $1 AND status = $2

name: multiple_tables_join
sql: SELECT o.id, u.name, p.title FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.id
